meta.description: Definition of the 4 Core Axes of Teasonality. Refined based on MyTeaReviews flavor profiles.
meta.logic: Each user gets a score on each axis. Moderate intensity (50-60%) = Lowercase (e.g., 'f'). High intensity (>60%) = Uppercase (e.g., 'F').

attributes.name: Fruity/Sweet
attributes.description: The Flavor Profile. 'F' gravitates towards bright, floral, berry, and sweet notes (e.g., Peach, Jasmine). 'E' gravitates towards deep, woody, nutty, and savory notes (e.g., Puerh, Rooibos, Ginseng).

attributes.name: Caffeinated
attributes.description: The Energy Axis. 'C' seeks fuel and focus (Matcha, Black, White). 'R' seeks calm and comfort (Herbal, Rooibos).

attributes.name: Traditional
attributes.description: The Style Axis. 'T' respects the leaf, origin, and ritual (Gongfu, Pure). 'A' loves blends, flavors, bubbles, and fun.

attributes.name: Pure
attributes.description: The Texture Axis. 'P' wants the clear, unadulterated liquor. 'M' loves the richness of milk, cream, or latte styles.
